DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect strength , balance , neuropathic symptom ( numbness , tingle , pain , weakness ) 12 week , bi-weekly , 60 minute , group exercise program design improve low extremity strength balance person oxaliplatin induced peripheral neuropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Strength Balance Training Program Persons With Oxaliplatin Induced Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: Prior history colon cancer Completed oxaliplatin base chemotherapy least 6 month prior enrollment Report numbness , tingle , pain low extremity â‰¥ 4 chemotherapy induce peripheral neuropathy ( CIPN ) Visual Analog Rating Karnofsky performance status least 60 % Able read , write , understand English Patients exclude study live outside 30 mile radius University South Florida , currently undergo chemotherapy radiation therapy , regularly ( least week ) participate strength balance training exercise . The investigator exclude participant participate aerobic exercise , collect information investigator may control aerobic exercise data analysis .
